snippet: Mrs. Bartos, whose gifts included support for the New York Public Library and the Museum of Modern Art, has her name on the lecture hall and education center at the library’s flagship branch.
abstract: Celeste Bartos, philanthropist who supported some of New York City’s most esteemed cultural institutions, dies at age 99.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Bartos, whose gifts included support for the New York Public Library and the Museum of Modern Art, has her name on the lecture hall and education center at the library’s flagship branch.

headline.main: Celeste Bartos, New York Philanthropist, Dies at 99
